title: Animated women
brief_description: Five very short films made by women give us glimpses of aspects of the lives of some women. The films include: 1. “The Ballad of Lucy Jordan” by Ian Moo Young. Music by Dr Hook and The Medicine Show (stills and animation) 2. “Later that night” by Barbara Bottner. Music by Phillip Namanworth (animation) 3. “Brews and potions” by Deborah Healy. Music by Valentino Brothers (animation) 4. “Made for each other” by Barbara Bottner. Music by Phillip Namanworth. 5. “A la votre” by Monique Renault. Music by Rene Koenig.
